name: Boa Sandersonia
text: On Play: If you have two or more characters in play with the (Amazon Lily) or (Kuja Pirates) type, return up to one of your opponents cost 3 or less character to its owner's hand.

effect.text: If you have two or more characters in play with the (Amazon Lily) or (Kuja Pirates) type, return up to one of your opponents cost 3 or less character to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Card marked as SAMPLE, but content is read from printed text.
